price: Innis isaan irratti dubbisee, isaan kan isatti amanan hin taane.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
